name: Super Scratch Bros (Linksab)
description:
SSB is finally on scratch after sooooo long. But this is not the latest version and some of the music in the game might be short. I made this game in Aug 30, 2019 and I will keep continuing making updates (not on scratch) until the final update releases. Credit to thesuperguidegames for making the original project. 

Changelog:

v1 Aug 30, 2019 - just ssb and almost done adding chris in game and in intro

v1.2 Sep 1, 2019 - added chris and new character just for test that horribly went wrong and added solo which is coming soon

v1.2.1 Oct 21, 2019 - added death n, decay stage also in Oct 20, 2019 added epicwolfchillli + new stage miiverse

v1.3 Oct 23, 2019 - added new stage special stage and tested out for 3D stage

v1.4 Dec 21, 2019 - added GP and Linksab in the game. Oh and also Fancy Pants Man and added another new stage the big city

v1.4.1 Mar 20, 2020 - changed special stage music 1, added chris's new ability, added David, and online which is coming soon. I had not worked on ssb for over 3 months at that time so I made an update

v1.4.2 May 10, 2020 - finished david, when you click on online it will say you will need parsec because online is not available yet and tried to add dust when you are landing. June 2 and June 7, 2020 - Chris has a up smash, fixed one of David and Chris’s sprites, changed the attack power for Chris’s special, finished A merry CHRIStmas stage (snores)

v1.4.3  Aug 30, 2020 - Added Micah and made Miiverse and Death n, decay stage bigger

Credit to Modern Sonic90 on YT for making some of the music

Credit to @MicahtheSummoner/bluegreenace 49 on yt for making the Death n, decay music.

And others.

Some music is not owned by me.

Game originally published in summer 2020
